attributes.action: Put a reasonable price on Millinery courses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like the Prime Minister to look at the HNC Millinery courses. For one day a week for A  35wk  slot, the course is over £4000 pounds, for one year. 
The course is a two year course I have a degree, so  I have to pay the full cost which is over £8000 pounds.
How can the Prime Minister put this sort of cost on a mature lady, that wants to enhance her skills, for the small business she has just started. 
I have a degree in Clothing/Fashion taken in the year 2000. For the past two years I have been given a place on a HNC Millinery course, but of course could not afford to pay the outrageous cost for a very limited course, with limited hours. 
Surely being a past tutor myself no one can give that amount of teaching for the cost I would have to pay.
Will the Prime Minister sponsor me or any member of Parliament,or better still make the cost affordable for everyone.  I know this particular HNC Millinery course is valuable to progress my business.
Please sign my pettition as I am still fighting to be able to get some help with the cost.
  
I have tried for the past two years trying to get help, and I have tried my local Member of Parliament and not found a solution.
